articles.title: Olympics: Carl Lewis slams US athletics men's relay team as 'total embarrassment' after semi failure - The Straits Times
articles.description: America's 4x100m squad finish a disappointing sixth and do not advance to the final.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: TOKYO (REUTERS) - The United States failed to make the Olympic men's 4x100 metres relay final after a ragged run saw them finish a shock sixth in their semi-final on Thursday (Aug 5), the latest in a… [+2332 chars]

articles.title: Tom Walsh takes bronze in Olympic shot put final - TVNZ
articles.description: Walsh finished behind American rivals, Ryan Crouser in first, and second-placed Joe Kovacs in a repeat of the Rio podium.
articles.content:
Tom Walsh has claimed the bronze medal in the men's shot put final this afternoon at the Tokyo Olympics.
Tom Walsh throws during the shot put qualification at the Tokyo Olympics.

articles.author: Suzanne Lynch
articles.title: Irish-American woman in prime position to be governor of New York - The Irish Times
articles.description: Kathy Hochul will replace Andrew Cuomo if he quits or is impeached in harassment scandal
articles.content:
As New York governor Andrew Cuomos political future remains in the balance, the focus has turned to his would-be successor.
As lieutenant governor for New York, Kathy Hochul will replace Cuomo if he… [+1098 chars]
